# set(_:)

**Instance Method**

Adds a new component to the set, or overrides an existing one.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency func set<T>(_ component: T) where T : Component
```

## Parameters

- **component**: The component to add.

## Updating the set

- **set(_:)**: Adds multiple components to the set, overriding any existing components of the same type.
- **remove(_:)**: Removes the component of the specified type from the collection.
- **removeAll()**: Removes all components from the collection.
